meanings.definition: A person who habitually expresses negative or pessimistic views
meanings.sent1: She is known as the office naysay, always finding faults in every project.
meanings.sent2: The constant naysay in the group brings down the team's morale.
meanings.sent3: The little naysay in the family always predicts rain on picnic days.
meanings.sent4: The old tree in the garden stands as a silent naysay to progress.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds gathered above were a naysay to the outdoor event.
